title: UGG Classic Mini Exotic Scales Sheepskin Boots Women's 10 Red
listperfectly_description:
Red-meets-pink UGG boots with exotic-scale embossing — warm enough for a winter farmers' market, bold enough to turn heads on a coffee run.

Red suede upper with a rosy-pink cast (color reads red to some and pink to others depending on lighting) and an allover exotic snake-scale embossed texture. Plush genuine sheepskin lining and UGG's signature gum rubber outsole. Classic mini pull-on silhouette with twill binding at the topline and a low-profile shaft that tucks easily under jeans or sits cleanly above leggings.

You will receive the following item(s):
- Women's Boots (pair)

Measurements:
- Size / Fit: US W 10 / UK 8 / EU 41 / AU ~10 / Reg Width
- Outsole length (heel-to-toe): 11.75 in (29.8 cm)
- Outsole width (widest): 4.50 in (11.4 cm)
- Insole length (heel to toe): 10.50 in (26.7 cm)
- Insole width (ball area): 3.50 in (8.9 cm)
- Heel height: 1 in (2.5 cm)
- Platform height (forefoot): 0.75 in (1.9 cm)
- Shaft height (from outsole): 5.50 in (14 cm)
- Shaft opening (circumference): 12 in (30.5 cm)
- Weight (pair): 2 lb (0.91 kg)

Photos show condition and measurements; ask if you need a specific angle or detail confirmed.
